very fun but higher ranks just gets down right annoying with all the insane perks and buffs killers get. Understand its supposed to be unfair by design but some perks are just so op you end up facing the same kind of set up 7 out of 10 times. So many perks that are just pretty much useless compared to the small amount amount that make sense to use. Survivors do have a good variety of perks and class types you can make but killers just the same thing over and over and over lol. Still recommend just be warned meta is big part of this game. BBQ and Chili will be the reason of most of your madness or noed xD

秦王绕柱

I dont know why this game or rather their developers think it is good to rework the game every 5 months so we have to learn to deal with something that's so stupid and makes us want to kill ourselves but I think im about done with it. They will continue to screw up the game as long as it makes money so if you are thinking about getting this game DONT. I know killer mains will say "oh the games fine!" and that's because survivors are constantly getting nerfed are how everyone that works for this game call it "reworked". This game is getting a rework soon and it is going to nerf not only survivor perks but killer perks to. I haven't seen anyone complain about the perks killers/survivors have for a while now and don't think, actually I know its not a problem at this point. This game will continually screw everyone over. The rework coming to this game soon is basically going to send everyone and everyones characters back to zero from whatever they were at before. Then they are going to make it even harder to get perks from a character that you just got and it will make you lose the motivation to even try and get the perk back. As many of us know we have to get bp or blood points to upgrade our characters and without events getting those bps are really hard. I would say if your lucky 25k-30k per match IF you are lucky. Now the reason I say lucky is because you can be so good at this game and escape without getting hooked, healed and unhooked others, did the objective, and still get below 20 thousand(K) blood points. And I know that you are thinking "this guy just sucks at the game." No ive played this game for 2 years now and since the beginning of the game it has not improved, not even in the slightest. It still manages to be a game that is running off of the very few people that are popular and still stream this game. Playing killer is not the only roll in this game yet the devs think so. I have played killer before and it is so easy that you only have to do the bare minimum and you will get 20k blood points easily. My last point in this game is that when you see killers complain about a perk like dh, ds, bt, stop and think about that you can play other killers that help you in this situation ORRRRR realize that you may just be bad at the game. I have seen way to many killers complain that someone having a perk to actually help them is a bad thing and we should just let the killer kill us. But you know the funniest part about that is? The developers in this game will see that ONE, ONE SINGULAR post and will nerf it or how they like to call it "reworking the game". No, its not reworking its nerfing but their to scared to admit that. Good luck playing this hell hole of a game!

Abyssal game Worst game ever

1933 hours today, I can say this much:

-the game is stale
-no new game modes were implemented over 6 years
-the game works, pretty much, the exact same as 6 years ago
-all the "additional" features added up to today (archive, side quests, events) are all still the same game mode with tiny variations to what to do

Ironically, the healing animation, still makes it look like you're using invisibile tape to cover your wounds and IT IS STILL THE SAME AS 6 YEARS AGO.

Is it still fun? Yeah, if you come back and just get the new characters coming out, it adds maybe a few hours more of variation. What the player base really needs is some game mode variation... to think it has such a huge potential with all the characters from famous franchaises and yet it keeps sleeping by throwing more skins at your face instead.
